user_query: Can you assist me in creating an ASCII art for my company's promotional materials? I need to load a previously generated ASCII image with the ID '2'. Additionally, I'm curious about the latest games available in the gaming industry. Please provide me with a list of games, sorted by name in ascending order.

TaskList.description: Load the ASCII image with the specified ID '2' for use in promotional materials.
Fetch the list of the latest games in the gaming industry, sorted by name in ascending order.
